author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Use a clip decorator in TerraAccordionSkin instead of setting the panels' sizes when animating.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Fix minor issue in CardPaneSkin when card pane's preferred size is explicitly set.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Add support for constrained preferred size to CardPaneSkin when matchSelectedCardSize is true.
